author: Naresh raju-2015-10-09T07:24:15-0400
title: Buses from Bangalore to Hyderabad
text:
| October 9, 2015 
“Garden city” and “silicon valley of India” is the capital of the state of Karnataka. Bangalore is situated at an altitude of 949 meters above the sea level on the Deccan Plateau. The citizens staying in Bangalore appreciate the smooth and great atmosphere through the season. 

Hyderabad is the hub for 
, but they are expensive and boarding them is not an easy experience. All the travelers can not afford for the flight charges. Traveling by bus is better means of transportation. There is nothing to worry as the booking the tickets of the bus is easy through online bus booking portals. You can book sit in the bus of your choice by a sitting in the room.
